Bridgid "Bree" O'Mara (4 Julaị 1968 – 12 Mee 2010) bụ onye akwụkwọ akụkọ Irish-South Africa, onye na-agba egwu ballet, onye na-emepụta TV na onye nnabata ikuku nke nwụrụ n'ihe mberede nke Afriqiyah Airways Flight 771

A mụrụ O'Mara na Durban, Natal Province, South Africa nke nne na nna Irish wee buru paspọtụ Irish.  Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Maris Stella na Durban n'oge mbido 1980s.  Mgbe ọrụ mbụ na ihe nkiri O'Mara rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eje ozi ụgbọ elu maka Gulf Air tupu ọ bụrụ onye na-emepụta vidiyo na Gulf States
Mgbe ọ gafechara Canada na United States, biri nwa oge na Elkins, West Virginia, ọ gara biri na London n'oge 1990s.  Ọ bi na Northamptonshire na mmalite 2000s
Na 2003 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo maka Mondo Challenge na Tanzania
Ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ nwata ya na South Africa na 2005.
N'oge ọnwụ ya, o biri na Kosmos, Madibeng, na di ya Christopher Leach
Onye agha Britain Mike Hoare bụ nwanne nna ya
O dere akụkọ ihe mere eme ya na-ebipụtaghị ya dị ka onye ahịa na Kongo n'oge 1960 na Seychelles na afọ mgbe 1970s
Ọ na-eme njem na ụgbọ elu Afriqiyah Airways Flight 771, nke dara na Libya, ka ọ na-aga ileta London maka nzukọ ya na ndị nkwusa
A manyere ya ka ọ gbahapụ n'emebe atụmatụ na London Book Fair site na ịkagbu ụgbọ elu na UK sitere na mgbawa Eyjafjallajökull
